subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga of France has been chasing the Big 4 of men’s tennis for most of his career, and this year’s tournament seems like a prime occasion for a breakthrough.
snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga of France has been chasing the Big 4 of men’s tennis for most of his career, and this year’s tournament seems like a prime occasion for a breakthrough.
